name: Exorcist
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The space is filled with the scent of holy water, incense, and the subtle tang of spiritual energy. The air carries the weight of supernatural forces and the battle between good and evil, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of spiritual warfare and the mysteries of the divine.
